snippet: Miriam Colon, a pioneering actress in U.S. Latino New York theater who starred in films alongside Marlon Brando and Al Pacino, died Friday....

headline.main: Canada Today: Border Anxiety, Homelessness and Prehistoric Life

lead_paragraph: Miriam Colon, a pioneering actress in U.S. Latino New York theater who starred in films alongside Marlon Brando and Al Pacino, died Friday.
